title: Validate SSL Decrypt policy -> Match Cretria ->  New Creatiria shows "OS Family"
custom_steps:
- Run Provisioner API to enable feature flag "feature flag: add_os_and_access_method_to_ssl_decryption" to 1 if not enabled
- Login to tenant and go to Policies -> SSL Decryption policy
- click on "New Policy"
- In Match Criteria -> click on Add Criteria
- Review Pop up should have existing values and in addition new 2 values "Access method" and "OS Family"
custom_expected: - Match criteria  Pop up should have existing values and in addition new 2 values "Access method" and "OS Family"
